description: This file defines the interface for CCSP Message Bus Service, including function declarations related to parameter management, session handling, and access control for the CCSP messaging system.

methods.name: CcspCcMbi_GetParameterValues
methods.description: Retrieves parameter values for specified parameter names from the message bus.

methods.name: CcspCcMbi_SetParameterValues
methods.description: Sets parameter values on the message bus for a specific session.

methods.name: CcspCcMbi_SetCommit
methods.description: Commits or cancels a batch of parameter changes for a session.

methods.name: CcspCcMbi_SetParameterAttributes
methods.description: Sets attributes for parameters on the message bus.

methods.name: CcspCcMbi_AddTblRow
methods.description: Adds a row to a specified table in the message bus.

methods.name: CcspCcMbi_DeleteTblRow
methods.description: Deletes a row from a specified table in the message bus.

methods.name: CcspCcMbi_GetParameterNames
methods.description: Retrieves parameter names, optionally at the next level in hierarchy.

methods.name: CcspCcMbi_CurrentSessionIdSignal
methods.description: Signals the current session ID with a given priority.

methods.name: AccessControlBitMaskToAccessList
methods.description: Converts a bitmask representing access control to a list format.

methods.name: AccessListToAccessControlBitMask
methods.description: Converts an access list string into a bitmask.

methods.name: MsgHelper_CreateCcdMbiIf
methods.description: Creates a message bus interface object for CCSP.
